name: Till Fall
description:
Vivi the little witch has only one mission! To brew potions to finally turn the hot and exhausting summer into autumn, because she can no longer stand the heat.

Help her collect all the items she needs for her autumn magic and change your surroundings! 

Controls for Keyboard and Gamepad

Move with WASD / LEFT STICK

Look around with MOUSE / RIGHT STICK

Jump with SPACE / BOTTOM BUTTON

Interact with E / WEST BUTTON

Pause the game with ESC / START

Credits

All Assets, ingame graphics and programming made by me

Music and sfx are all from Weloveindies.com
